heading: Thursday Night
text: Chance of early flurries near and south of Route 2, otherwise clearing. Lows from zero to 10 below, with cold hollows around 15 below. Northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 30 mph, decreasing after midnight.

heading: Friday
text: Mostly to partly sunny. Valley highs mainly in the upper teens to lower 20s. Northwest winds 5 to 10 mph early, becoming light and variable, then becoming south 5 to 10 mph west of the Greens.

heading: Friday Night
text: Gradually increasing clouds. Lows from the mid teens to around 20, except single digits to lower teens northeast. Winds becoming light, variable to south, except from the south at 5 to 15 mph in the Champlain Valley.
